dialogStrings: Mideel,Weapon Store

“So that overgrown moon's
gonna fall on us, huh?”{PAUSE}“This's no joke!
We've got to start stocking up
on supplies before they're all gone!”{PAUSE}“Outta the way!
Hey, move it, move it!”

“You again!
You aren't hoarding up
goods too, are you?”{PAUSE}“Don't reach in front of me!
Everything in this store is mine!”{PAUSE}“I've got money to burn!
I've been saving like mad
just for a time like this!”{PAUSE}“C'mon, outta the way!
Move, will you, move!”

“Oh…not much time left!!
You never know when that moon's gonna
come crashing down!!”

“When it all comes down to it,
this world's about money
and material things!”{PAUSE}“If you got 'em, you can
get by whenever, wherever!”{PAUSE}“Gotta buy!!
Gotta buy, buy, buy!!
I'm gonna shop till I drop!!”

“Welcome to the charity store,
a store of love and courage!
What can I get you today?”

“Thank you very much!
Please come again.”

“Welcome to the charity store,
a store of love and courage!”{PAUSE}“Unfortunately, regarding
the place you'd like to go…”{PAUSE}“The other customers have booked it all up…
I'm afraid nothing's left.”

“…just kidding!
Ha, hah, hah!
Now how can I help you?”

{Tifa}
“No good…
I wonder if it's locked?”

{Cid}
“No good…
Someone must've locked it.”

{Tifa}
“Hmm…you really locked this one up good.”

{Cid}
“Damn, why the hell did they
make something tricky like this?”

{Tifa}
“…The key broke off inside,
and I can't get to it…”{PAUSE}“…
I don't know anything about it.”

{Cid}
“…The key broke off inside,
and I can't get to it…”{PAUSE}“…
I don't know a thing about it…”

{Tifa}
“Oh yeah, shall I try
that old beat up key?”

{Cid}
“Hey, I know what'll do it…
Let's try that beat up old key!”

{CHOICE}Use the beat up old key!
{CHOICE}Forget it

{Tifa}
“I'd better not.
It doesn't look like it fits.”

{Cid}
“Naw, forget it…
It doesn't even look like it fits.”

{Tifa}
“Okay, this is it.”

{Cid}
“Yeah, this is it.”

{Tifa}
“Hmm…Huh?
This is pretty tight…”

{Cid}
“Huh? Wha?
Won't turn…”

{Tifa}
“Eyaaah!?”

{Cid}
“Wha?”

{Tifa}
“Oh no!
…it broke.
Now I can't get it out…”

{Cid}
“Hoo, *&%$^%
Busted it…
Can't get the damn thing out…”
“Is something wrong?”

{Tifa}
“Ulp!?”

{Cid}
“Ulp!!”

{Tifa}
“Huh? Uh, no…”

{Tifa}
“What am I gonna do?”{PAUSE}{CHOICE}Lie your butt off!
{CHOICE}Tell them the truth!

{Cid}
“Oh, uh, no, uh I…”

{Cid}
“Damn, this's bad…”{PAUSE}{CHOICE} What the hell…lie!
{CHOICE} Just apologize and get it over with!

{Tifa}
“Nothing! I was just thinking
how nice that door was, that's all.”

{Cid}
“Er, nothin'. Hah, hah.
That's one nice door you got there, y'know.”
“Oh…why, thank you very much.”

{Tifa}
“Whew…that was close.
But I feel bad…”

{Cid}
“Phew…that was a close one.
But I kinda feel a little bad about it.”

{Tifa}
“I'm…sorry!
I forced the key and it broke!”

{Cid}
“Mmm…sorry!
I twisted the ^%$#^ and it broke.”

“Huh?
Key? You mean the one to that door?”

“Hah, hah, hah!
That's a good one!”

“Of course there's no key.
It's a wall. We just painted a door on it.”

{Tifa}
“What!?
It's not a real door?”

{Cid}
“Say what?
You drew that door on the wall?”

“That's right. We drew it on there to make
it feel like you could pass through
it to another world.”{PAUSE}“Sorry to have surprised you.
It's not much of an apology, but
please take this.”

{Tifa}
“Really?
Thank you.”

{Tifa} and the others
received "Cursed Ring"!

{Cid}
“Oh, uh…well
Thanks.”

{Cid} and the others
received "Cursed Ring"!

“We're hoping to pass through
a door like that one into another world.”{PAUSE}“I feel that you all might be able to
make my dreams come true.
Weird, isn't it?”

{Tifa}
“What is it?
You're being awful friendly all of a sudden.”{PAUSE}“Oh, so that's it.
You want the Mimmet Greens…don't you?”

{CHOICE}Give it some Mimmet Greens
{CHOICE}Don't give it any

{Tifa}
“Sorry, little guy.
I can't give you any.”

{Tifa}
“Well, okay.
Here, go ahead and eat.”

{Tifa}
“hee hee…how cute!
I just want to tickle him.”

{Cid}
“What's this!?
You're bein' awful friendly.”{PAUSE}“Oh, so that's it.
You want the Mimmet Greens…don't you?”

{CHOICE}Give it some Mimmet Greens.
{CHOICE}Don't give it any.

{Cid}
“Sorry, shorty.
But I can't give ya any.”

{Cid}
“Well, guess there's no way around it.
Here ya go, shrimp. Eat up.”

{Cid}
“Heh heh, hey he's kinda cute.
Aw, maybe I'll just tickle him a little.”

The chocobo looks like it
enjoyed eating the Greens.

Tickle his feet
Tickle his stomach
Tickle his neck
Tickle his belly button
Tickle behind his ears
Tickle under his arms
The chocobo looks like it loves that.
The chocobo looks a little ticklish.
The chocobo looks a little angry.
The chocobo looks a little shy.
The chocobo looks bored.
Dined and dashed.
Received Materia from the Chocobo!

But you've got too much Materia
you can't take on anymore…
The chocobo put the Materia away.

{Tifa}
“Oh, you scared me…!
I thought you were dead!”

{Cid}
“Sheesh, you scared me.
I thought you croaked!!”

Chocobos ignore humans who
don't look like they'll give them greens.
